Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using recombinant alpha-synuclein proteins with the E26K mutation and wild-type controls.

Readout description.Result Description: The E26K variant exhibited significantly increased fibril formation compared to wild-type, as measured by enhanced ThT fluorescence intensity.

Biological replicates.Description: Biological replicates were not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Technical replicates were not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No explicit negative control was described in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: ThT fluorescence intensity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: ThT fluorescence intensity exceeding 50% of wild-type levels.
